title: Introduction to the yarrawater package
text: Vignettes show use package practice, just function works. yarrawater vignettes give short, example-based guides explore water-quality data interactive app.

title: Introduction to the yarrawater package
text: yarrawater provides cleaned version Yarra River water-quality data, together interactive Shiny app quick visual exploration. can load data directly: view :
code: library(yarrawater) data("yarra_wq_clean", package = "yarrawater") dplyr::glimpse(yarra_wq_clean) #> Rows: 888 #> Columns: 14 #> $ `Site ID`             <dbl> 229143, 229143, 229143, 229143, 229143, 229143, … #> $ Name                  <chr> "YARRA @ CHANDLER HWY", "YARRA @ CHANDLER HWY", … #> $ Datetime              <dttm> 1991-01-08 13:50:00, 1991-02-12 09:35:00, 1991-… #> $ `Data Type`           <chr> "Quality", "Quality", "Quality", "Quality", "Qua… #> $ `Parameter ID`        <dbl> 210, 210, 210, 210, 210, 210, 210, 210, 210, 210… #> $ Parameter             <chr> "pH", "pH", "pH", "pH", "pH", "pH", "pH", "pH", … #> $ Value                 <dbl> 7.1, 7.0, 6.2, 6.7, 7.7, 6.9, 6.1, 6.7, 7.7, 7.4… #> $ `Unit of Measurement` <chr> "pH", "pH", "pH", "pH", "pH", "pH", "pH", "pH", … #> $ Quality               <dbl> 65, 65, 65, 65, 65, 65, 65, 65, 65, 65, 65, 65, … #> $ Resolution            <chr> "Raw Data", "Raw Data", "Raw Data", "Raw Data", … #> $ Date                  <date> 1991-01-08, 1991-02-12, 1991-03-12, 1991-04-09,… #> $ Month                 <ord> January, February, March, April, May, June, July… #> $ Weekday               <ord> Tuesday, Tuesday, Tuesday, Tuesday, Tuesday, Tue… #> $ Hour                  <int> 13, 9, 14, 11, 11, 10, 12, 12, 11, 13, 12, 10, 1…

title: Introduction to the yarrawater package
text: Learn : summarise visualise water-quality indicators pH turbidity,compare values decades sites,interpret boxplots understand long-term changes.

title: Introduction to the yarrawater package
text: can also explore dataset interactively : yarrawater::run_my_app() app lets : select parameters read explanations outputs mean.

title: Introduction to the yarrawater package
text: Data cleaning structure — raw data processed (see data-raw/yarra_wq_clean.R). Custom styling — Change colors layout www/style.css. Extending package — Add data cleaning scripts new datasets.

title: Introduction to the yarrawater package
text: yarrawater offers end--end workflow: Clean data -> Explore -> Visualize -> Interact Try loading data, making simple plot, using app deeper exploration.

title: Yarra River Water Quality Explorer
text: yarrawater package helps users explore changes Yarra River water quality 1990s 2020s.

title: Yarra River Water Quality Explorer
text: yarrawater package helps users explore changes Yarra River water quality 1990s 2020s. provides cleaned dataset, useful plotting functions, interactive Shiny app comparing water quality indicators pH, Salinity EC@25, Turbidity, Water Temperature.

title: Yarra River Water Quality Explorer
text: tools help users visualise different water parameters changed time.
code: library(yarrawater)  # Launch the interactive Shiny app run_my_app()  # Create a static summary plot plot_yarra_data()

title: Yarra River Water Quality Explorer

title: Yarra River Water Quality Explorer
text: Data: yarra_wq_clean — cleaned Yarra River water quality dataset. Functions: run_app() — launches interactive Shiny dashboard. plot_yarra_data() — creates plots comparing 1990s 2020s. Shiny: Located inst/shiny-app/, allowing users select parameters plot types interactively. Documentation: functions data objects clearly documented using roxygen2. pkgdown website: https://etc5523-2025.github.io/assignment-4-packages--shiny-apps-nana0119/

title: water quality measurements from Victorian Department of Energy, Environment, and Climate Action. — yarra_wq_clean
text: cleaned dataset used Shiny app. dataset water quality observations Yarra River, comparing pre-pandemic (1990s) recent decades (2020s).

title: water quality measurements from Victorian Department of Energy, Environment, and Climate Action. — yarra_wq_clean
water quality measurements from Victorian Department of Energy, Environment, and Climate Action. — yarra_wq_clean
text: data frame 888 rows 14 variables: Site ID Year record industry Industry factor revenue Revenue (BRL) net_profit Net profit (BRL) data frame 888 rows 14 variables: Datetime Date time water sampling. Parameter Type measurement ("pH", "Turbidity", "Salinity EC@25"). Value Measured numeric value parameter. Unit Measurement unit, e.g., NTU mg/L. Site Sampling location. Source Data source, e.g., EPA Victoria.

title: water quality measurements from Victorian Department of Energy, Environment, and Climate Action. — yarra_wq_clean
